name: betting-platform
description: Mock sports betting platform with microservices architecture

scripts.dev: npm run build:shared && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev -w api-gateway" "npm run dev -w user-service" "npm run dev -w wallet-service" "npm run dev -w bet-service" "npm run dev -w odds-service" "npm run dev -w event-service"
scripts.docker:dev:build: docker compose --profile dev build --no-cache && docker compose --profile dev up -d
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/*/node_modules backend/shared/dist frontend/dist
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
